title: Umar Sani Muhammad
text: My Name is Umar Sani Muhammad I have a strong academic background in Mathematics, Statistics and Computer science which are essentials for data science, I have Bsc Mathematics and just of recent I finished my Msc in Computational Mathematics from Bayero University Kano. I was lucky to be part of first cohort of Arewa Data Science Academy in which we were trained on Python programming and Machine learning. I also have a keen interest in learning new techniques and tools for data science especially in the area of Natural Language processing (NLP) and Time series analysis.

title: Quarto Basics
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure 1.


Code
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
#theta = 2 * np.pi * r
theta = 4 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()





Figure 1: A line plot on a polar axis
